channel.title: Comments on: השירות הצבאי שלי – חלק חמישי
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: xtreeq: I think you're right, but I remember a difference between the closed section and "C" section. I just don't remember what it is. I'll leave the story as it is for now, though.
item.content:encoded: xtreeq: I think you’re right, but I remember a difference between the closed section and “C” section. I just don’t remember what it is. I’ll leave the story as it is for now, though.

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.description: If I'm not mistaken, there was a fence above all section "c", wasn't there? I stayed there for 3 weeks (did a lot of walking).
item.content:encoded: If I’m not mistaken, there was a fence above all section “c”, wasn’t there? I stayed there for 3 weeks (did a lot of walking).
